name: Captive (itch) (FreezeStudios)
description:
Captive is a short survival horror game.

You play as Will Smith, A victim of a notorious kidnapper in his neighborhood. You're now stuck in a prison cell hearing the screams of other victims as they're executed in the next room. You must escape at all costs without leaving a single trace behind.

  • Average Playthrough lasts 7-12 minutes
  • The game is still under development so you may run into bugs.
  • If you get stuck you can find the walkthrough here.
CONTROLS  Movement  
WASD
Interact  E Inventory ISprint    LShift Crouch    LCtrl  PauseGame Escape  SOCIAL

This game will remain free but you can help me get a faster PC by donating. :) If you liked the game consider leaving a review and a comment.
